dokei= de\ tragikw/teron kexrh=sqai
eu)qu\s e)n a)rxh=| th=| metafora=|, politikw/teron de\ u(po\
*dhmosqe/nous ei)rh=sqai to\ au)to\ no/hma e)n tw=| th=s parapresbei/as

cit.quote:
me/myaito d' a)/n tis
to\ prooi/mion w(s tragiko\n kai\ peritto\n kai\ e)pilo/gw| ma=llon e)oiko/s.
scholion ibid. p. 353 R. o(/ra de\ pw=s e)pilogikw=s h)/rcato
a)po\ sunhgo/rwn e)kbolh=s, w(/sper kai\ o( *dhmosqe/nhs.

a)ciou=si tine\s me/mfesqai tw=| r(h/tori
e)n a)gw=ni sunhgo/rwn e)kbolh\n poihsame/nw|, de/on e)n e)pilo/gw|.

plei/ous trapo/menos
tropa\s tou= *eu)ri/pou p. 331 Sch. e)/sti de\ to\ kw=lon
xarientismo/s. e)painou=si de\ tou=to to\ kw=lon oi( kritikoi\
le/gontes swfro/nws au)to\ pefra/sqai kai\ ou) kou/fws.

e)pilamba/netai de\ *dionu/sios,
o(/ti to\ parakataqe/sqai fulakh=s plei/on' e)/ndeicin
e)/xei, e)pi\ de\ tw=n swma/twn to\ e)nanti/on gi/gnetai,
diafqei/rontai ga\r e)/sq' o(/te. ou)kou=n kakw=s e)xrh/sato
th=| le/cei o( *ai)sxi/nhs.

cit.quote: o( *dionu/sios e)pilamba/netai. ou) ga/r, fhsi/, nikh=sai boulo/meqa th\n a)reth/n, w(s tou\s a)ntagwnista/s.
